sentence: i need to find a flight between saint petersburg and charlotte that would leave in the afternoon and arrive as soon after five p m as possible . a nonstop flight please
sq2:
SELECT DISTINCT  '"'||v0.flight_id||'"', v0.arrival_time, v0.stops,
 v0.departure_time, '"'||v6.airport_code||'"', '"'||v7.city_code||'"',
 '"'||v7.city_name||'"', '"'||v8.airport_code||'"',
 '"'||v9.city_code||'"', '"'||v9.city_name||'"' FROM flight v0,
 airport_service v6, city v7, airport_service v8,
 city v9 
WHERE ((v0.arrival_time = (
SELECT MIN (v1.arrival_time) FROM flight v1 
WHERE ((v1.stops =  0) AND ((v1.departure_time BETWEEN  1200 
AND  1800) AND ((v1.from_airport IN (
SELECT v2.airport_code FROM airport_service v2 
WHERE (v2.city_code IN (
SELECT v3.city_code FROM city v3 
WHERE (v3.city_name = 'ST. PETERSBURG'))))) 
AND ((v1.to_airport IN (
SELECT v4.airport_code FROM airport_service v4 
WHERE (v4.city_code IN (
SELECT v5.city_code FROM city v5 
WHERE (v5.city_name = 'CHARLOTTE'))))) 
AND (v1.arrival_time >  1700))))))) AND ((v0.stops =  0) 
AND ((v0.departure_time BETWEEN  1200 AND  1800) 
AND (((v0.from_airport = ANY v6.airport_code) AND ((v6.city_code = ANY v7.city_code) 
AND (v7.city_name = 'ST. PETERSBURG'))) 
AND (((v0.to_airport = ANY v8.airport_code) AND ((v8.city_code = ANY v9.city_code) 
AND (v9.city_name = 'CHARLOTTE'))) 
AND (v0.arrival_time >  1700))))));
sql: ( SELECT DISTINCT FLIGHT.FLIGHT_ID FROM FLIGHT WHERE ( FLIGHT.ARRIVAL_TIME = ( SELECT MIN ( FLIGHT.ARRIVAL_TIME ) FROM FLIGHT WHERE ( FLIGHT.STOPS = 0 AND ( FLIGHT.DEPARTURE_TIME BETWEEN 1200 AND 1800 AND ( FLIGHT . FROM_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' ST. PETERSBURG ' ) ) AND ( FLIGHT . TO_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' CHARLOTTE ' ) ) AND FLIGHT.ARRIVAL_TIME > 1700 ) ) ) ) ) AND ( FLIGHT.STOPS = 0 AND ( FLIGHT.DEPARTURE_TIME BETWEEN 1200 AND 1800 AND ( FLIGHT . FROM_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' ST. PETERSBURG ' ) ) AND ( FLIGHT . TO_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' CHARLOTTE ' ) ) AND FLIGHT.ARRIVAL_TIME > 1700 ) ) ) ) ) ) ;
